scripts.install-node: nvm install 20.6.1 && nvm install 18.17.1 && nvm install 16.20.0 && nvm install 14.21.3 && nvm install 12.22.12 && nvm install 10.24.1
scripts.benchmark-all: npm run benchmark-foreach && npm run benchmark-forin && npm run benchmark-forloop && npm run benchmark-forloopcached && npm run benchmark-forloopcached && npm run benchmark-forof
